properties.title: Install and load the climwinb packages-dev-user-name-at-domain-com

outputs.name: stderr
outputs.text:
Loading required package: ggplot2

Loading required package: gridExtra

Loading required package: Matrix


Attaching package: ‘zoo’


The following objects are masked from ‘package:base’:

    as.Date, as.Date.numeric

cells.source:
# Install and load the climwinb packages
if (!requireNamespace("climwin", quietly = TRUE)) {
  install.packages("climwin",repos = "http://cran.us.r-project.org")
}
if (!requireNamespace("zoo", quietly = TRUE)) {
  install.packages("zoo",repos = "http://cran.us.r-project.org")
}

zoo = ''
climwin = ''
library(climwin)
library(zoo)

# Generate example temperature data
set.seed(123)
temperature_data <- rnorm(365, mean = 15, sd = 5)

# Define the window size (e.g., 30 days)
window_size <- 30

# Convert temperature_data to a zoo object for rollmean
temperature_zoo <- zoo::zoo(temperature_data)

# Calculate the rolling mean temperature within a moving window
rolling_mean_temp <- rollmean(temperature_zoo, k = window_size, fill = 0.0)

temperature_zoo_str <- toString(temperature_zoo)
rolling_mean_temp_str <- toString(rolling_mean_temp)
temperature_data_str <- toString(temperature_data)

original_source:
if (!requireNamespace("climwin", quietly = TRUE)) {
  install.packages("climwin",repos = "http://cran.us.r-project.org")
}
if (!requireNamespace("zoo", quietly = TRUE)) {
  install.packages("zoo",repos = "http://cran.us.r-project.org")
}

zoo = ''
climwin = ''
library(climwin)
library(zoo)

set.seed(123)
temperature_data <- rnorm(365, mean = 15, sd = 5)

window_size <- 30

temperature_zoo <- zoo::zoo(temperature_data)

rolling_mean_temp <- rollmean(temperature_zoo, k = window_size, fill = 0.0)

temperature_zoo_str <- toString(temperature_zoo)
rolling_mean_temp_str <- toString(rolling_mean_temp)
temperature_data_str <- toString(temperature_data)
title: Install and load the climwinb packages-dev-user-name-at-domain-com
